New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the second-fastest goal ever in international football within seven seconds.
Wirtz's goal is the fastest in German international history.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored a long-range goal within seven seconds after receiving a pass from Toni Kroos.
Toni Kroos registered an assist in his first international match since Euro 2020.
Kai Havertz added to Germany's lead in the second half.
